text: The Jungle Book is a 2016 American fantasy adventure movie directed by Jon Favreau, written by Justin Marks and produced by Walt Disney Pictures. It is based on Rudyard Kipling's The Jungle Book and inspired by Walt Disney's 1967 animated movie of the same name. It stars Favreau, Marks and producer Brigham Taylor developed the movie's story with a mixture between Disney's animated version and Kipling's original books. Filming began in 2014, with filming taking place in Los Angeles. The Jungle Book was released to very positive reviews in North America on April 15, 2016. It has a 95% on Rotten Tomatoes. ==References== ==Other websites== * * ==Cast== * Neel Sethi as Mowgli * Bill Murray as Baloo * Ben Kingsley as Bagheera * Idris Elba as Shere Khan * Lupita Nyong'o as Raksha * Scarlett Johansson as Kaa * Giancarlo Esposito as Akela * Christopher Walken as King Louie * Garry Shandling as Ikki Category:2016 adventure movies Category:2016 fantasy movies Category:2010s American adventure movies Category:2010s American fantasy movies Category:Movies about snakes Category:Movies about tigers Category:Movies about bears Category:Movies about wolves Category:Movies about apes Category:Jungle movies Category:Movies set in India Category:Disney movie remakes Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Jon Favreau
title: The Jungle Book (2016 movie)
